channel.title: Good client
channel.description: Please can some1 send me a link to a rsps client good one and please change the ip to hero2play.no-ip.org, port 43594, Please THE REWARD IS Admin on my rsps the rsps is cool name is Pk Destiny. I posted because i did everything etc. Changing ip and port to mine but when my friend tries to log in it says error connecting to server. But i can log in. Please give me a client or HELP!! I coded for 2 months and all that hard work goes to nothing...

item.title: Good client
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

-Hero-:

Please can some1 send me a link to a rsps client good one and please change the ip to hero2play.no-ip.org, port 43594, Please THE REWARD IS Admin on my rsps the rsps is cool name is Pk Destiny. I posted because i did everything etc. Changing ip and port to mine but when my friend tries to log in it says error connecting to server. But i can log in. Please give me a client or HELP!! I coded for 2 months and all that hard work goes to nothing…

We are not a spoon feeding community. You can however go to the download section and pick one of the millions of PI client rip offs and pick up a guide in its section on how to change the IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Good client
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

TBH a good client is 317 Deob. Then just edit that to your liking. Trust me, I used to go in the downloads section and try to find a server and client with tons of items and cool customs that I liked. But you probably won’t ever get a server that is your “dream” server or perfect. Start off on a 317 Deob and add all the shit YOU want.

Read full topic

item.title: Good client
item.dc:creator: @Hero2 -Hero-
item.description:
@Hero2 wrote:

Can you please tell me how to portford correctly then? what i do is go to torrent then i go to options, setup guide, i change location to uk,London then the port 43594 and a tick to automatic port mapping and both got green and i save and close. PLEASE HELP!!!
